title: Digital Marketing Self-Learning Plan
description: A self-learning plan to gain foundational knowledge and skills in digital marketing.

weeks.title: Introduction to Digital Marketing
learningObjectives: Understand the key components of digital marketing
Learn about different digital marketing channels and their applications
Gain an overview of the digital marketing landscape and industry trends
topicsToCover: Digital marketing channels (e.g., search engine marketing, social media marketing, email marketing, content marketing)
The role of digital marketing in modern business strategies
weeklyTasks: Complete online courses or tutorials on digital marketing fundamentals
Research and analyze current digital marketing trends and best practices
resources: Digital Marketing Fundamentals course on Coursera
The Beginner's Guide to Digital Marketing by Moz

weeks.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
learningObjectives: Understand the principles of search engine optimization
Learn how to conduct keyword research and optimize website content
Gain knowledge on technical SEO and off-page optimization techniques
topicsToCover: On-page SEO (e.g., title tags, meta descriptions, content optimization)
Technical SEO (e.g., site structure, page speed, mobile optimization)
Off-page SEO (e.g., link building, content promotion)
weeklyTasks: Conduct keyword research for a sample website
Optimize a web page for search engine visibility
Analyze a website's technical SEO and identify areas for improvement
resources: Beginner's Guide to SEO by Moz
SEO for Beginners course on Udemy

weeks.title: Social Media Marketing
learningObjectives: Understand the role of social media in digital marketing
Learn how to develop and implement a social media marketing strategy
Gain knowledge on creating engaging social media content and managing social media platforms
topicsToCover: Social media platforms and their unique features
Content creation and curation for social media
Social media analytics and performance tracking
weeklyTasks: Create a social media marketing plan for a sample business
Develop a content calendar and create sample social media posts
Analyze the performance of a social media campaign using analytics tools
resources: The Beginner's Guide to Social Media Marketing by Hootsuite
Social Media Marketing course on Coursera

weeks.title: Email Marketing and Content Marketing
learningObjectives: Understand the principles of effective email marketing
Learn how to create and distribute valuable content to attract and engage customers
Gain knowledge on measuring the success of email and content marketing campaigns
topicsToCover: Email marketing strategy and best practices
Content marketing strategy and content creation
Measuring email and content marketing performance
weeklyTasks: Develop an email marketing campaign for a sample business
Create a content marketing plan and produce a sample piece of content
Analyze the performance of an email or content marketing campaign using relevant metrics
resources: Email Marketing Fundamentals course on Udemy
